aircraft.value: Talon Swift - AC-8378-804 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Fuel control unit drift. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 12/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 13/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 14/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 15/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 19/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
